14:47 <vmassol> @evalica: I think it could be nicer to point to the right jiras in the README don't you think?  
14:47 <vmassol> (since it's pretty hard for people to know what jira to use)  
14:48 <evalica> vmassol: k - good idea - ty  
14:53 <benoitc> has quit  
14:56 <benoitc> has joined #xwiki  
15:16 <DarkKnightCZ> has quit  
15:19 <cjd> has quit  
15:20 <cjd> has joined #xwiki  
15:27 <vmassol> sdumitriu: ping and hi  
15:28 <vmassol> sdumitriu: there's a thread for which I would like to have your opinion: http://markmail.org/message/zyumvtqgw4jvajjt Would be great if you could reply on the list about it  
15:29 <sdumitriu> vmassol: OK, will do  
15:29 <vmassol> thx  
15:29 <sdumitriu> Hi to you too  
15:30 <vmassol> hope you're doing well! Still using XWiki? :)  
15:30 <sdumitriu> Yes, of course  
15:31 <vmassol> I also hope you like the nested spaces feature we've introduced, I don't remember seeing much comments from you on this topic  
15:31 <vmassol> cool  
15:31 <vmassol> you were the one to create that jira issue back in 2009 or so  
15:31 <vmassol> :)  
15:31 <sdumitriu> Unfortunately I didn't yet have time to look into it at all  
15:31 <sdumitriu> But looking forward to it  
15:31 <sdumitriu> We're waiting for things to settle, still on 7.1.2  
15:32 <vmassol> ok, should be stable pretty soon  
15:32 <vmassol> I'd say 1.5-2 months from now at most  
15:32 <vmassol> (for production)  
15:32 <vmassol> for testing, 7.3 is out and should be good
